title: ICE: RegionKind::ReError constructed but no error reported

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
Possibly related to https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/107988 ? ### Code `cargo +nightly test` in `chwp v1.183.0` The error message is in building `assertor v0.0.1` but I can't reproduce with just building that crate, which is odd. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.69.0-nightly (9a7cc6c32 2023-02-16) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9a7cc6c32f1a690f86827e4724bcda85e506ef35 commit-date: 2023-02-16 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.69.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: RegionKind::ReError constructed but no error reported ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: RegionKind::ReError constructed but no error reported | = note: delayed at 0: ::emit_diagnostic 1: ::delay_span_bug:: 2: ::mk_re_error_misc 3: rustc_infer::infer::lexical_region_resolve::resolve 4: ::resolve_regions 5: rustc_hir_analysis::check::compare_impl_item::compare_method_predicate_entailment 6: rustc_hir_analysis::check::compare_impl_item::compare_impl_method 7: rustc_hir_analysis::check::check::check_mod_item_types 8: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 9: ::check_mod_item_types 10: ::for_each_module:: 11: rustc_hir_analysis::check_crate 12: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 13: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 14: ::analysis 15: >::enter::, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}::{closure#2}::{closure#3}> 16: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 17: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::run_compiler, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}> 18: >::set::, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 19: std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 20: <::spawn_unchecked_, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#1} as core::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once::{shim:vtable#0} 21: as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once at /rustc/9a7cc6c32f1a690f86827e4724bcda85e506ef35/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1988:9 22: as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once at /rustc/9a7cc6c32f1a690f86827e4724bcda85e506ef35/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1988:9 23: std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start at /rustc/9a7cc6c32f1a690f86827e4724bcda85e506ef35/library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:108:17 24: 25: note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.69.0-nightly (9a7cc6c32 2023-02-16) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `assertor`; 1 warning emitted warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... ```
